SEARCH
Module skyBattle
Package com.hcyzz1company.skybattle.core.level

Class LevelParent

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
com.hcyzz1company.skybattle.core.level.LevelParent
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelOne, LevelThree, LevelTwo
public abstract class LevelParent extends Observable
Abstract class that represents a game level. Handles the game loop, user input, unit spawning, collision detection, and level transitions.

  • Constructor Summary

    LevelParent(String backgroundImageName, int playerInitialHealth)
    Initializes the game level with background and player health.

    • LevelParent

      public LevelParent(String backgroundImageName, int playerInitialHealth)
      Initializes the game level with background and player health.
      Parameters:
      backgroundImageName - the name of the background image
      playerInitialHealth - the initial health of the player

      Initializes friendly units for the level.

      Checks if the game is over and handles transitions.

    • winLevel

      protected abstract boolean winLevel()
      Abstract method to check if the level is won.
      Returns:
      true if the level is won, false otherwise

    • spawnEnemyUnits

      protected abstract void spawnEnemyUnits()
      Abstract method to spawn enemy units for the level.

    • instantiateLevelView

      protected LevelView instantiateLevelView()
      Instantiates the LevelView, which displays health and score.
      Returns:
      the LevelView instance for the level

    • initializeScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene initializeScene()
      Initializes the scene for the level, including the background and friendly units.
      Returns:
      the Scene for this level

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game by beginning the animation timeline.

      public void goToNextLevel(String levelName)
      Moves to the next level by notifying observers.
      Parameters:
      levelName - the name of the next level

    • getBackground

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getBackground()
      Returns the background image of the level.
      Returns:
      the background image as an ImageView

      Stops the game and shows a win image when the user wins.

      the current number of enemies

    • addEnemyUnit

      protected void addEnemyUnit(ActiveActorDestructible enemy)
      Adds an enemy unit to the level and the root group. The enemy is added to both the list of enemy units and the scene's root group for rendering.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy unit to add

    • getEnemyMinimumYPosition

      protected double getEnemyMinimumYPosition()
      Returns the min Y position where enemies can spawn.
      Returns:
      the min Y position for enemy spawn

    • getEnemyMaximumYPosition

      protected double getEnemyMaximumYPosition()
      Returns the maximum Y position where enemies can spawn. This position is determined by the screen height and any necessary adjustments.
      Returns:
      the maximum Y position for enemy spawn

    • stopCurrentLevelActivities

      public void stopCurrentLevelActivities()
      Stops all activities related to the current level. This method stops the game timeline and deletes any observers associated with the level.

    • getLevelView

      protected LevelView getLevelView()
      Returns the LevelView object that displays game-related information such as health and score.
      Returns:
      the LevelView for this level

    • updateExtraLevelView

      protected void updateExtraLevelView()
      Updates additional views related to the level. This method can be overridden to update extra views. Currently, it does nothing in this base class. If specific level need to the action, you can rewrite it in Child class.
